rComments: I loved her!! This was my first linguistics course so I had a little bit of trouble with some topics but she's an easy grader when it comes to the assignments and group projects. Try and you'll do perfectly fine!!

She is very enthusiastic about the subject and wants students to succeed! She is also very sweet. I didn't read the book much, but that probably would have made the class easier. There are quizzes every so often along with one midterm and one final. A lot of open discussion about the topics.

Okamoto sensei is whip smart, so don't be deceived by her polite demeanor. She is a keen observer of sociolinguistics and while her classes aren't necessarily hard, one can deduce the ins and outs of tactical japanese speech. She has a dry humor that is subtle but cutting and she doesn't respect the nice but dumb types. Love her.
